question: You are getting married. Write a letter to an English-speaking friend to invite him/her to the wedding. In your letter:* describe who you are going to marry,* tell the schedule* explain why it’s important him/her be at the wedding.
text: I hope this finds you well. I am writing this to invite you to a special moment in my life.

I am getting married ,my dear friend. There is no wonder whom  I am going to take as a bride. You know her really well, actually you are the one who proposed to me  this wonderful woman. Yeah, it is non-other than Sushmitha. At last, we going hitch.
The wedding ceremony will take place at the hotel Cinnamon Gardens, Colombo on the 25th of September. Proceedings will start with the Poruwa ceremony at 10.30am, and the function will end at 3pm.

Being my lifesaver when I was in Australia, not only that but also for being the person who proposed to this wonderful woman, I need you at my wedding pal. It would be an honour for both of us. So, save your date.
Until we meet at the function, let me stop here.
